data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehnert, Helmut, Stone, Robert P. (2019): Two new species of Geodiidae (Porifera, Demospongiae, Astrophorina) from the Emperor Seamounts, North Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 4671 (3): 381-395, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4671.3.4|4 occurrences
